summary: Only one! marriable follower argonian male in Skyrim. Derkeethus\\\' Replacer MOD
descriptionHtml:
Warning! This mod is NOT Lore-Friendly.

First, I don\\\'t like vanilla\\\'s argonian face. maybe I\\\'d like style of Dragon.

Second, I wanna that argonians have hair.

So, I make this MOD. XD

I use some other mod(JazzJr\\\'s Argonian Retexture & my Castanic Horn Retexture.)

Look my ultimate argonian Derkeethus! (plz :P)



[ Follower information ]

Body : FS Flaccid body, weight 100, scale 1.00 / JazzJr Argonian texture

Level : max 81

Skill : Light armor 100, Sneak 100, Onehanded 100(Dual weapon available), Archery 100

Equip : Leather armor, boots, wrist / Hunting bow, Iron dagger, Iron arrows
           Horns of Argonian(type : Helm / Playable, Enchantable, No armor rating) 

Location : Dark water path(must perform quest)

ETC : Marriable follower, essential



[ Installation ]

Use 7z, you see 4 files. Derkeethus.esp, fix.esp, bsa, bsl.

Not NMM competible. plz manual install.

You just drop 4 files in Data folder and active 2 esp file.

MOD order
...
Derkeethus.esp
Derkeethus fix.esp
...

* Warning! If you already have UFO, must order under UFO.



[ Option ]

Option folder : miner outfit Derkeethus
* must use one esp file.

< Recommendation MOD >
Bandana in Skyrim : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20900
Sunglasses Oni Edition : ???

If you have head-size bug, plz set one of these skeleton MODs.

If you use SOS, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36938
(but although you don\'t use SOS, this skeleton isn\'t problem in your game.)

If you don\'t use SOS, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6239




[ Processing ]
* non-essential (option) ---> if you may want this, UFO has this option.(essencial on/off)

[ Update ]

9/2
* Low power Ver added
 (Overdraw80->20, Armsman80->20, Barbarian80->20)

8/22
* Language box bug fixed!
* No body meshes & textures ---> Face texture is not correct. Now fixed it.

8/21
* max level 81 ----> max level 100
* Free body ver added
* Optional miner outfit added



[ Credits ]

JazzJr argonian retexture by FallenAngle
Iridum eyes by Halendia
Castanic Horns meshes by SARU
SG male hair by Mooduki
author: Gazdio01
